archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.3.7f: f) providing an escrow facility (e.g. for information, proprietary technologies, application source code and cryptographic keys) using a trusted external party (e.g. a legal representative, lawyer or equivalent).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
